Sim" | occupation = Novelist | birth_date = | birth_place = Liège, Belgium | death_date = | death_place = Lausanne, Switzerland | awards = Académie royale de Belgique (1952) }} Georges Joseph Christian Simenon (; 13 February 1903 - 4 September 1989) was a Belgian writer. He published nearly 200 novels and many short works.
